alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 4:53AM EST until January 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to locally heavy snow will continue off and on today. Additional Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Schuyler, Steuben, Yates, Seneca and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While some drier air has reduced snow coverage, snow will become steadier again later this morning, mainly across the western Finger Lakes. Sleet may briefly mix with the snow in some areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5 1 1 from within the state.

area.areaDesc: Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates
